title: I feel I shouldn't be banned.
body: I logged on to be notified of my "14-Day suspension" for "unsportsmanlike behaviour." This is totally wrong. I'll take ownership of my actions, by stating what I did wrong first. I may have muttered "kys %%%" to a player who deserved it. He was being very disrespectful of me and my teammates all game, and he kept calling me a "gay boi" repeatedly. I understand that "kys %%%" is not really an acceptable term, but the guy had it coming. I doubt very seriously if he even got punished, seeing as to I never actually reported him. I feel this ban is very unfair, and I'd like it to be considered of removal. I play this game avidly and do not think I deserve a 14 day ban. A mute at most will shut me right up.

replies.body:
> I may have muttered "kys %%%"

And that's all it takes. There is no excuse for this behavior that Riot has zero tolerance for. What you should've done was mute and report.

But you did neither and now a toxic player may keep playing and harassing other players while you get banned despite your implied hours of play which in no way protect you from punishment.

Telling someone to kill themselves over a video game is never ok.

Using homophobic language against someone is never okay.

Not saying you're wrong, xidphel, just clarifying why it's not ok.
